text: Frans Bolweg (30 March 1950 â€“ 10 January 2015) was a Dutch sailor, scout, speaker, National Race Officer, and since 1995 International Judge. Bolweg was Amsterdam, Netherlands. Bolweg had a short career, in Clipper, Europe and Laser, as regatta sailor however developed himself into a race organizer. Bolweg died of eye cancer in Monnickendam, Netherlands, aged 64. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the Netherlands Category:Deaths from eye neoplasm Category:Sportspeople from Amsterdam Category:Dutch sailors
title: Frans Bolweg
